author: prbuzz.com
title: Amazon.com Introduces New Cooking Product Burger Press - Single Hamburger Patty Maker by Padditon
text:
A new kitchen product has been launched on Amazon that allows people to cook the perfectly sized Hamburger
Amazon.com, a leading online shopping website has now added a new product to its platform. The Burger Press Single Hamburger Patty Maker by Padditon is now available with a lifetime product warranty.
The Burger Press Single Hamburger Patty Maker is made from the highest quality material for durability and is currently priced at $14.95. It comes with a free burger recipe eBook to give people recipe ideas. The kitchen accessory is aimed at providing a solution for people wishing to make turkey burgers, chicken patties and more.
A burger press has become an important tool for people wishing to make the perfect burger. It removes the messier job of turning cold raw meat into a finished hamburger. One of the problems when it comes to making burgers besides the mess is trying to get the burger to the right size. The Burger Press removes the mess out of making burgers and takes care of much of the labor.
Amazon has provided important information on the Single Hamburger Patty Maker, which includes technical information, and the money back guarantee. They have also included reviews from previous buyers to allow people to read how they found the product and if they would recommend it to other Amazon customers.
The Burger Press - Single Hamburger Patty comes with free shipping with orders over $35. A 100% money-back guarantee is given to customers who are not satisfied with the product. There is an option to have the product delivered within 24 hours.
The product is available on Amazon by visiting http://www.amazon.com/dp/B011HYEREW
About Burger Press - Single Hamburger Patty Maker by Padditon
The Burger Press - Single Hamburger Patty Maker by Padditon provides people with a way to make and cook the perfect burger.
